title: Any idea when will the pixel 5 come in India it has not been released here yet? On amazon.in its exp
content:
Any idea when will the pixel 5 come in India it has not been released here yet?
On amazon.in amazon indian website the phone is showing pixel 5 5g at Rs 79000 that is about US$ 1053. There is a huge price difference in USA its available at 650 US$ and as you can see that there is a huge difference between the prices as the phone pixel 5 has still not been released here in India.
I wonder why amazon india have kept the price so high.

https://www.amazon.in/Google-Pixel-5G-128GB-Black/dp/B08H8X23ZB/ref=mp_s_a_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=pixel+5&qid=1606139117&sr=8-1
You can check on this link and compare the original prices.
